title: Super-CLEVR: A Virtual Benchmark to Diagnose Domain Robustness in Visual Reasoning. (arXiv:2212.00259v2 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: Visual Question Answering (VQA) models often perform poorly on out-of-distribution data and struggle on domain generalization. Due to the multi-modal nature of this task, multiple factors of variation are intertwined, making generalization difficult to analyze. This motivates us to introduce a virtual benchmark, Super-CLEVR, where different factors in VQA domain shifts can be isolated in order that their effects can be studied independently. Four factors are considered: visual complexity, question redundancy, concept distribution and concept compositionality. With controllably generated data, Super-CLEVR enables us to test VQA methods in situations where the test data differs from the training data along each of these axes. We study four existing methods, including two neural symbolic methods NSCL and NSVQA, and two non-symbolic methods FiLM and mDETR; and our proposed method, probabilistic NSVQA (P-NSVQA), which extends NSVQA with uncertainty reasoning. translated_title: 超级CLEVR：诊断视觉推理领域稳健性的虚拟基准
translated_abstract: 视觉问答（VQA）模型经常在分布外数据上表现不佳，并且在领域泛化上遇到困难。由于这个任务的多模态性质，多个变化因素相互交织，使得泛化分析难以分析。这激励我们引入一个虚拟基准，超级CLEVR，其中可以分离VQA领域转移中的不同因素，以便能够将它们的效果独立地进行研究。考虑了四个因素：视觉复杂度、问题冗余、概念分布和概念组成性。通过可控生成的数据，超级CLEVR使我们能够测试VQA方法，在其中测试数据沿着每个轴与训练数据有所不同的情况下。我们研究了四种现有方法，其中包括两种神经符号方法NSCL和NSVQA，以及两种非符号方法FiLM和mDETR；以及我们提出的方法，概率NSVQA（P-NSVQA），它将不确定性推理与NSVQA扩展。在所有情况下，P-NSVQA的性能优于其他方法，我们还展示了，超级CLEVR可以成为分析VQA中领域泛化的有用诊断工具。
tldr: 本文提出了一个虚拟基准Super-CLEVR，使得我们可以通过分离视觉问题应对领域转移中的各种因素，探究VQA方法的领域泛化能力。作者在四个VQA领域变量上测试了四种方法和一种新方法P-NSVQA，结果表明P-NSVQA比其他方法的性能更好，Super-CLEVR是分析VQA领域泛化的有效工具。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a virtual benchmark, Super-CLEVR, to diagnose domain robustness in visual reasoning by separating different factors in VQA domain shifts for independent study. By testing on four VQA domains, the authors show that their proposed method, P-NSVQA, outperforms four existing methods and Super-CLEVR is a useful diagnostic tool.
